title: This, That Or The Other: IX
teaser: Why do the names of cocktails, wrestling moves and old-timey occupations sound so alike? All the clues in this game fit into one of these three categories.
contentencoded:
Grab a Corpse Reviver and perform a Shining Wizard with your Thimblerigger. (Why do the names of cocktails, wrestling moves and old-timey occupations sound so alike?) All the clues in this game fit into one of these three categories.

Heard in 'Til Death Metal Do Us Part
